Chinese.name: 定时拨测
Chinese.description: 本示例代码的功能是定时拨测 URL 列表中的地址，并通过邮件发送告警。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时，需要设置定时触发器，并修改拨测列表、配置发送邮箱、修改接收邮箱的地址。

English.name: URLCheckByTimer
English.description: This demo will use timer trigger to check url list. If there are wrong lists, it will send alarm by email.
English.attention: When you use this demo, you should change the url list,email host,email notfiication list.
